snippet: Although Roger Federer lost in the final of the Brisbane International, he said he was eager for the Australian Open to begin next week.
abstract: Lleyton Hewitt defeats Roger Federer in men's final of Brisbane International; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Although Roger Federer lost in the final of the Brisbane International, he said he was eager for the Australian Open to begin next week.

headline.main: Federer Falls to Hewitt, but Australian Open Awaits
